segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks determined to get as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to trust that her brother will share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over if he leans any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will turn around and catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting closer to the stool, making the floor even more slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's focus is solely on the cookie jar, nothing else seems to matter to him right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they can get away with it, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so tense, I can't look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
